PostgreSQL 10.6.description:
PostgreSQL (10.6), open-source relational DBMS.

Based on the official PostgreSQL docker image: https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres.

Note: This rock-on requires Rockstor version 3.9.2-53 or later.

5432.description: PostgreSQL port. Suggested default: 5433 (Rockstor typically uses 5432 already)
5432.label: PostgreSQL port

/var/lib/postgresql/data.description: Choose a share where the database should be stored. E.g.: create a share called postgresql106-data for this purpose alone.
/var/lib/postgresql/data.label: Data Storage

POSTGRES_USER.description: Choose A Super User name for the PostgreSQL installation
POSTGRES_USER.label: SuperUser

POSTGRES_PASSWORD.description: set a password for the Super User.
POSTGRES_PASSWORD.label: SuperUser password
